meanings.sent1: I disagree with my friend about the best movie.
meanings.sent2: We often disagree on what toppings to get on our pizza.
meanings.sent3: My cat seems to disagree with me when I tell her it's time for a bath.
meanings.sent4: The colors of the painting disagree with the rest of the room.
meanings.sent5: The two siblings always disagree on which TV show to watch.

meanings.sent1: The committee members disagree on the budget proposal.
meanings.sent2: They disagree on the best way to solve the problem.
meanings.sent3: The GPS and the map disagree on the correct route to take.
meanings.sent4: The weather forecast and the actual weather disagree today.
meanings.sent5: The students disagree on the topic for their group project.

meanings.sent1: The new software update disagrees with the old operating system.
meanings.sent2: His actions disagree with his words, causing confusion.
meanings.sent3: My favorite color disagrees with the color scheme of the room.
meanings.sent4: The ingredients in the recipe disagree with my dietary restrictions.
meanings.sent5: The loud music disagrees with my headache.
